summary: The customer contacted Contoso Wireless to express their dissatisfaction with the services they have been receiving since signing up for the premium package. The customer service agent was able to provide the customer with more information about Contoso's Ultra Plus plan, which offers unlimited data with no throttling, 24/7 customer support, and a 30-day money back guarantee. The agent also provided the customer with information on how to sign up for the plan online or by phone.
